DOC.brief_title: Augmentation Trial Prazosin Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD )
DOC.detailed_description: This 15-week randomized parallel design , double-blind , placebo-controlled augmentation trial prazosin evaluate efficacy tolerability prazosin augmentation treatment PTSD trauma-related nightmare , sleep disturbance , global function sense well-being , clinical feature comorbidities PTSD . Participants 210 OIF/OEF soldier veteran suffer war zone trauma . Participants randomize 1:1 prazosin placebo previous psychotropic medication and/or psychotherapy maintain constant . Randomization stratify site use antidepressant .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Age > 18 year ; Clear evidence exposure one war zone trauma event sufficient satisfy DSMIV criterion A1 diagnosis PTSD ; DSMIV diagnosis PTSD derive CAPS ; CAPS total score > 50 ; CAPS Recurrent Distressing Dreams item score > 5 ( maximum score 8 ) ; stable dose nonexclusionary medication psychotherapeutic treatment least 4 week prior randomization ; good general medical health . Female participant must agree use reliable form birth control study . Exclusion Criteria Psychiatric/Behavioral meet DSMIV criterion current schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder , psychotic disorder , delirium , DSMIV cognitive disorder ; substance dependence disorder within 3 month current substance dependence ; current cocaine stimulant abuse ; severe psychiatric instability severe situational life crisis , include evidence actively suicidal homicidal , behavior pose immediate danger patient others . Medical acute unstable chronic medical illness , include unstable angina , recent myocardial infarction ( within 6 month ) , congestive heart failure , preexist hypotension orthostatic hypotension , chronic renal hepatic failure , pancreatitis , Meniere 's disease , benign positional vertigo ; narcolepsy , diagnose sleep apnea ; allergy previous adverse reaction prazosin alpha1 antagonist .
